thread.title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
thread.title_full: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish

author: JAMES ELLINGWORTH
title: Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish
text:
Luca Bruno Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish 
  leads during the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP   wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish 
  steers his car during the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP   wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish 
A policeman stands on a bridge as   leads during the Formula One Russian Grand Prix at the Sochi Autodrom, in Sochi, Russia, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP   Sunday, October 11, 2015 9:06 am | Updated: 12:01 pm, Sun Oct 11, 2015. Hamilton wins Russian GP as Rosberg fails to finish   Lewis Hamilton took a huge step toward retaining his Formula One title by winning the Russian Grand Prix on Sunday as his main rival Nico Rosberg failed to finish. 
Hamilton can now win his third career title at the next race in Texas, while his Mercedes team retained the constructors' title after a season in which the silver cars have dominated almost every race.
